name: Greavard
flavorText: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.

previous.name: Glimmora
previous.flavorText: When this Pokémon detects danger, it will open up its crystalline petals and fire beams from its conical body.

next.name: Houndstone
next.flavorText: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.
